pos{time: T, y: Y} :-
  startPos{time: T, y: Y} |
  stepPos{time: T, y: Y}.
startPos{time: 1, y: 0}.
stepPos{time: T, y: NewPos} :-
  gte{a: T, b: 1} &
  add{a: PrevTime, b: 1, res: T} &
  pos{time: PrevTime, y: PrevPos} &
  add{a: PrevPos, b: 3, res: NewPos}.
----
application/datalog
